mapper.insert: insert into wedding(wed_hall, wed_title, wed_min, wed_max, wed_txt, wed_txt2, wed_fname, wed_size, wed_food, wed_direct, wed_type, wed_price) values(#{wed_hall}, #{wed_title}, #{wed_min}, #{wed_max}, #{wed_txt}, #{wed_txt2}, #{wed_fname}, #{wed_size}, #{wed_food}, #{wed_direct}, #{wed_type}, #{wed_price})
mapper.select: select * from wedding order by id asc
select * from weddingtime order by wt_id asc
select wed_hall from wedding order by id asc
mapper.insert: insert into weddingresv(wresv_content, wresv_day,wresv_cday, wresv_time,wresv_wday, wresv_hall, userid, wresv_name, wresv_phone, wresv_inwon, wresv_code, wresv_email, wresv_pay) values(#{wresv_content}, now(), #{wresv_cday}, #{wresv_time}, #{wresv_wday}, #{wresv_hall}, #{userid}, #{wresv_name}, #{wresv_phone}, #{wresv_inwon}, #{wresv_code}, #{wresv_email}, #{wresv_pay})
